name: Necromancer Crypt
description: A hidden laboratory dedicated to death magic contains dangerous experiments and forbidden knowledge. The valuable magical knowledge attracts ambitious spellcasters, while the dark nature and dangerous experiments create constant supernatural hazards.
atmosphere: Stone chambers house forbidden experiments with death magic while unholy symbols cover the walls. The air carries decay, chemical preservatives, and dark magic. Corpses in various stages of animation serve the necromancer's research. Books of forbidden knowledge line obsidian shelves.
